name: hyperlist
description: A performant virtual scrolling list library

scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s HyperList lib/index.js | derequire > dist/hyperlist.js
scripts.watch: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s HyperList lib/index.js -o 'derequire > dist/hyperlist.js' -v

author: Tim Branyen (@tbranyen)
